name: Real Modern city Bus driving simulator 3d 2016 - transport passengers through real city traffic
name_original: Real Modern city Bus driving simulator 3d 2016 - transport passengers through real city traffic
description:
Have you any bus driving know-how? No? Don’t worry we are giving you a chance of being a bus driver in a transport simulator game? So, imagine yourself as an experience and expert bus driver.
In this city bus driving simulator 16 you can drive real bus driving game with high quality 3D graphics and realistic gameplay. We also offer you Multiple Buses with realistic Bus controls and "Animated game character".
It’s time to control your bus simulator, and shift the gears, as you are going to get the best bus driving simulator experience by being the public bus driver. This challenging bus simulator game gives you a golden opportunity to play with the big public transport bus in realistic 3D environment, learn how to park long vehicle precisely in crowded areas. As a city bus driver your task is to park the public bus at the bus stop in the given time and pick and drop the passenger families, to their desired destination.
Time and route finding are the most important factors because passengers are always hurry to reach their destinations.
So get ready to drive most thrilling and stunning buses with real control and physics implementation.
City Bus Driving Simulator Features:
• 3D Modern Buses
• Realistic Physics
• 15 multiple challenging missions
• Beautiful 3D Environment
• Best Bus simulator Racer
• Full of Animation pack
• Heavy Traffic and busy City Roads
• Pick and drop passengers
• Super detailed interiors environment routes
• Stunning and eye catching Graphics
• Smooth and easy controls
• User friendly
• Realistic Animated characters
• Intelligent Traffic system
• Addictive gameplay
